Meaning and Description: RSI > 70 indicates that the price may be overbought and a price correction or downward reversal is likely.
RSI < 30 indicates that the price may be oversold and a price rebound or upward reversal is likely.
RSI above 50 typically shows a strong uptrend, while below 50 shows a strong downtrend.
Crossing of RSI above 30 or below 70 can serve as potential buy or sell signals.
